name: Format\Link
description: The addition object for defining links in text components that don’t use HTML or Markdown formatting.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Always link for a Link object.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL that should be opened when a user interacts with the range of text specified in the addition.

properties.name: rangeLength
properties.description: The length (in characters) of the character range.

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description: The starting character index for which the addition is meant. A text range starts at 0 for the first character.
